Address.Address1: Divanyolu Cad. Bicki Yurdu Sk. No:12

Description.Text: Just a short walk from the Blue Mosque in the heart of Sultanahmet, Atlantis Hotel provides clean and comfortable rooms along with friendly service and a lovely rooftop terrace. The friendly staff team warmly welcomes you to relax in comfort at Atlantis Hotel. This traditional-style hotel is just steps away from Istanbul's most famous attractions. Each of the rooms is clean and appointed with air conditioning. Free wireless internet is available in Atlantis Hotel's public areas. Start your day on Atlantis Hotel's cosy rooftop terrace and enjoy a rich breakfast. Take a stroll around Sultanahmet and visit the Hagia Sophia, just a short walk from the hotel. Atlantis Hotel's convenient location is less than 5 minutes' walk to the tram stop, allowing you easy access to the rest of Istanbul. For an unforgettable stay in the heart of the Old City, Sultanahmet.Enjoy the difference. The hotel also offers dry cleaning, lobby and reception.

The hotel is situated in Sultanahmet, the historical district of Istanbul. Atlantis Hotel is surrounded by city's major attractions, Hagia Sophia Museum, Topkapi Palace, Basilica (Yerebatan) Cistern, Grand Bazaar, the Mosque of Sokulu Mehmet Pasha, Archeological Museum, The Museum of Turkish and Islamic Handicrafts.

Single Room - Single Room offers 1 Single Bed with air conditioning, alarm clock,minibar , cable / satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, heating, internet access, laundry service, non-smoking rooms, private bathroom, wireless internet, room service and telephone.
Double/Twin Room - Double/Twin Room offers 1 Double Bed or Two Twin Beds with air conditioning, alarm clock,minibar , cable / satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, heating, internet access, laundry service, non-smoking rooms, private bathroom, wireless internet, room service and telephone.
Triple Room - Triple Room offers 1 Double Bed and 1 Single Bed or Three separate beds with air conditioning, alarm clock,minibar , cable / satellite TV, color TV, hairdryer, heating, internet access, laundry service, non-smoking rooms, private bathroom, wireless internet, room service and telephone.
